mapper.select: SELECT s.schedule_id, TO_CHAR(s.start_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS startDate, m.title AS title, m.director AS director, m.actors AS actors FROM schedule s LEFT JOIN movie m ON s.movie_id = m.movie_id LEFT JOIN screen sc ON s.screen_id = sc.screen_id WHERE m.title = #{title}

SELECT s.schedule_id, TO_CHAR(s.start_DT, 'HH24:MI') AS startTime, sc.screen_id, sc.screen_name As screenName FROM schedule s LEFT JOIN movie m ON s.movie_id = m.movie_id LEFT JOIN screen sc ON s.screen_id = sc.screen_id WHERE TO_CHAR(s.start_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') = #{startdate}
